name: Snappy Bird
description:
Welcome to Snappy Bird!

In this game, you control a bird, who flaps his wings and they make a snap sound (technically you never hear this sound in the game). Fly through the air and don't hit pipes for the high score! :D

Support for Joy-Cons is added (any key to flap), and I haven't tested XBOX and PS yet but they should work. If you get them to work please tell me.
